column4: i was wondering why k9copy keeps crashing and if there is any method to fixing it
does anyone know a method to stop k9copy from crashing
run it from terminal. look for error messages. Ive rarely had it crash here.
its proberly a front end to other command line tools.. so it may be a bit tricky to just downlaod and isntall
to hard drive as an ISO file? or a video file?
theres dozens of dvd ->? video ripper tools out. Handbreak is popular. ogmrip is also popular
